full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YUL GYI DUG SEL BA'I YUL LHA'I GTOR 'BUL SMAN DPA' BO CHIG THUB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(GTOR MA GTZANG SAR BZHAG ,'DI NYID YUL GYI DUG SEL BA'I YUL LHA'I GTOR 'BUL SMAN DPA' BO CHIG THUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI RIGS RUS SHING DU MTHO ZHING LUGS ZUNG MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN DANG LDAN PA DANG DAD PA BRTAN DAM TSIG GTZANG @004B MA TENG D'A KHI BI PE LI DA LAS TSU KHER DPON RIN PO CHE BDE LEGS PHUN TSOGS GTZO BCAS BLA CHEN RNAMS DANG, ,SHOG GI DPON SLOB 'BANGS MTHA' YAS PAS, ,KHO PO LA SNYING NYE BA'I SEMS KYIS SPRINS YIG MAndAL KHA GTAGS DANG BCAS PA 'BYOR ZHU BA'I LAN DPE CHA GSAR DU SBYAR BA 'DI DANG BCAS PA DANG LDAN SLOB MA TSOGS RNAMS LA RIG 'DZIN SNYING 'DUS PA TE DZA BADZRAS GDAMS PAR MDZAD DE SPYINGS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
